description: Shopify is an e-commerce platform enabling merchants to create online stores, manage products, and process payments with themes, apps, and integrated marketing tools

tools.name: SHOPIFY_ADD_PRODUCT_TO_COLLECTION
tools.description: Adds a product to an existing *custom collection*, optionally specifying its `position` if the collection is manually sorted.

position.title: Position
position.description: Optional 1-based position if the custom collection is manually sorted; product is added to the end if unspecified or collection isn't manually sorted.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: Identifier of the product to add.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_COUNT_PRODUCT_IMAGES
tools.description: Retrieves the total count of images for a Shopify product, useful for inventory management or display logic; the provided `product_id` must exist in the store.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier for the Shopify product whose images are to be counted.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_CUSTOM_COLLECTION
tools.description: Creates a new custom collection in a Shopify store, requiring a unique title for manually curated product groupings (e.g., 'New Arrivals', 'Seasonal Specials').

title.title: Title
title.description: Unique title for the custom collection, visible to customers and used for product organization.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_CUSTOMER
tools.description: Tool to create a new customer in Shopify. Use when you need to add a new customer record to the store.

note.title: Note
note.description: An optional note about the customer.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A comma-separated string of tags to associate with the customer.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: The customer's phone number (E.164 format recommended).

password.title: Password
password.description: The customer's password. If provided, password_confirmation is also required.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: The phone number for this address.

default.title: Default
default.description: Whether this is the default address.

address2.title: Address2
address2.description: An optional additional field for the street address.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: The last name for this address.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: The first name for this address.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: A list of addresses for the customer.

verified_email.title: Verified Email
verified_email.description: Whether the customer has verified their email address.

send_email_invite.title: Send Email Invite
send_email_invite.description: If true, sends the customer an email invite to create an account.

send_email_welcome.title: Send Email Welcome
send_email_welcome.description: Whether to send the customer a welcome email. Defaults to true. If send_email_invite is true, this can be set to false.

password_confirmation.title: Password Confirmation
password_confirmation.description: Confirmation of the customer's password. Required if password is provided.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_ORDER
tools.description: Creates a new order in Shopify, typically requiring line items; if `customer_id` is provided, it must correspond to an existing customer.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the amounts in the order (e.g., USD, CAD, EUR).

total_tax.title: Total Tax
total_tax.description: The total amount of tax for the order. This should be a numeric value representing the sum of all taxes.

line_items.title: Line Items
line_items.description: A list of line item objects, each representing an item in the order. Each object should specify at least a `variant_id` (or `product_id`) and `quantity`. Other common fields include `price` and `title`. At least one line item is required.

customer_id.title: Customer Id
customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with this order. If provided, the order will be linked to this customer. This field is optional.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: A list of transaction objects associated with the order, typically representing payment information. Each object usually includes `kind` (e.g., 'sale', 'authorization'), `amount`, `status`, and `gateway`.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT
tools.description: Creates a new product in a Shopify store; a product title is generally required.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the product, typically required by Shopify.

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: The name of the product's vendor or manufacturer.

variants.title: Variants
variants.description: Product variants. Common keys include 'price', 'sku', 'option1', 'option2', 'inventory_quantity'. At least one variant is typically required; if not provided, Shopify might create a default one.

body_html.title: Body Html
examples: This is a really awesome t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton.
body_html.description: A detailed description of the product, which can include HTML formatting for rich text.

product_type.title: Product Type
product_type.description: A category for the product, used for filtering and organizing products in Shopify.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT_IMAGE
tools.description: Tool to create a new product image for a given product. Use when you need to add an image to a product by providing the image source URL or attachment.

image.title: Image

src.title: Src
src.description: The source URL of the image.

position.title: Position
position.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the main image for the product.

metafields.title: Metafields
metafields.description: A list of metafields to associate with this image.

variant_ids.title: Variant Ids
variant_ids.description: An array of variant IDs to associate this image with.

image.description: An object containing the image details.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The ID of the product to associate the image with.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
tools.description: Creates a new metafield for a specific Shopify product.

key.title: Key
key.description: The key for the metafield. Must be at least 3 characters long.

type.title: Type
type.description: The value type of the metafield. Defaults to single_line_text_field.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: The namespace for the metafield. Must be at least 3 characters long.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product to add a metafield to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the information that the metafield contains.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_CUSTOM_COLLECTION
tools.description: Permanently deletes a custom collection from a Shopify store using its `collection_id`; this action is irreversible and requires a valid, existing `collection_id`.

collection_id.title: Collection Id
collection_id.description: The unique identifier for the custom collection that needs to be deleted. This ID is a numerical string assigned by Shopify when the collection is created.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT
tools.description: Deletes a specific, existing product from a Shopify store using its unique product ID; this action is irreversible.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product to be deleted. This ID is essential for targeting the correct product for removal.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT_IMAGE
tools.description: Deletes a specific image from a product in Shopify, requiring the `product_id` of an existing product and the `image_id` of an image currently associated with that product.

image_id.title: Image Id
image_id.description: The unique identifier of the specific product image to be deleted.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product from which the image is to be deleted.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
tools.description: Deletes a specific metafield from a Shopify product using the product ID and metafield ID.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product.

metafield_id.title: Metafield Id
metafield_id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield to delete.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ALL_CUSTOMERS
tools.description: Retrieves customer records from a Shopify store, with options for filtering, selecting specific fields, and paginating through the results.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: A list of specific customer IDs to retrieve. If empty, all customers (matching other filters) will be retrieved.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of customers to retrieve. Defaults to 50, with a maximum value of 250.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: A comma-separated list of customer fields to include in the response (e.g., 'id,email,first_name'). By default, all fields are returned.

since_id.title: Since Id
since_id.description: Retrieve only customers with an ID greater than this specified ID. This is used for paginating through results.

created_at_max.title: Created At Max
created_at_max.description: Filter customers created before or on this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 datetime string (e.g., '2023-10-26T10:00:00-05:00').

created_at_min.title: Created At Min
created_at_min.description: Filter customers created after or on this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 datetime string (e.g., '2023-10-26T10:00:00-05:00').

updated_at_max.title: Updated At Max
updated_at_max.description: Filter customers last updated before or on this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 datetime string.

updated_at_min.title: Updated At Min
updated_at_min.description: Filter customers last updated after or on this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 datetime string.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTION_BY_ID
tools.description: Retrieves a specific Shopify collection by its `collection_id`, optionally filtering returned data to specified `fields`.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve; if omitted, all fields are returned. E.g., 'id,title,handle'.

collection_id.title: Collection Id
collection_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify collection to retrieve.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTS
tools.description: Retrieves a list of collects from a Shopify store, where a collect links a product to a custom collection.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of collects to retrieve (1-250).

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve (e.g., `id,collection_id,product_id`); if unspecified, all fields are returned.

since_id.title: Since Id
since_id.description: Retrieve only collects created after this ID, for pagination.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTS_COUNT
tools.description: Retrieves the total count of collects (product-to-collection associations) in a Shopify store.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOM_COLLECTIONS
tools.description: Retrieves a list of custom collections from a Shopify store, optionally filtered by IDs, product ID, or handle.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: A comma-separated string of custom collection IDs to retrieve.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of custom collections to return (between 1 and 250).

handle.title: Handle
handle.description: Filter results by the custom collection's unique, human-readable string identifier (e.g., 'summer-specials').

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: Filter results to custom collections that contain a specific product ID.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOM_COLLECTIONS_COUNT
tools.description: Retrieves the total number of custom collections in a Shopify store.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOMER
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific customer from a Shopify store, provided their valid and existing `customer_id`.

customer_id.title: Customer Id
customer_id.description: The unique identifier for the customer in Shopify.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOMER_ORDERS
tools.description: Retrieves all orders for a specific, existing customer in Shopify using their unique customer ID.

customer_id.title: Customer Id
customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer whose orders are to be retrieved.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDER_LIST
tools.description: Retrieves a list of orders from Shopify with optional filters and pagination.

inputSchema.title: GetOrderListRequest

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: Comma-separated list of order IDs to return. You may provide a list of integers; it will be converted to a comma-separated string.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of results per page (default 50, maximum 250).

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. You may provide a list; it will be converted to a comma-separated string.

status.title: Status
status.description: Filter by order status. Valid values: open, closed, cancelled, any.

since_id.title: Since Id
since_id.description: Return orders with IDs greater than this ID.

page_info.title: Page Info
page_info.description: Cursor for pagination. When using page_info for cursor pagination, only limit may accompany it.

created_at_max.title: Created At Max
created_at_max.description: Show orders created at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp (for example, 2024-12-31T23:59:59Z).

created_at_min.title: Created At Min
created_at_min.description: Show orders created at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp (for example, 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z).

updated_at_max.title: Updated At Max
updated_at_max.description: Show orders last updated at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp.

updated_at_min.title: Updated At Min
updated_at_min.description: Show orders last updated at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp.

financial_status.title: Financial Status
financial_status.description: Filter by financial status. Valid values: authorized, pending, paid, partially_paid, refunded, voided, partially_refunded, any, unpaid.

processed_at_max.title: Processed At Max
processed_at_max.description: Show orders imported at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp.

processed_at_min.title: Processed At Min
processed_at_min.description: Show orders imported at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp.

attribution_app_id.title: Attribution App Id
attribution_app_id.description: Show orders attributed to a specific app ID. Use 'current' to show orders for the calling app.

fulfillment_status.title: Fulfillment Status
fulfillment_status.description: Filter by fulfillment status. Valid values: shipped, partial, unshipped, any, unfulfilled.

inputSchema.description: Retrieve a list of orders with optional filters and pagination parameters.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDERSBY_ID
tools.description: Retrieves a specific Shopify order by its unique ID, which must correspond to an existing order.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response (e.g., 'id,line_items').

order_id.title: Order Id
order_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify order to retrieve.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDERS_WITH_FILTERS
tools.description: Retrieves Shopify orders filtered by dates and other filters. Uses server-side filtering.

inputSchema.title: GetOrdersWithFiltersRequest

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: Comma-separated list of numeric order IDs to retrieve.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return per page (1-250).

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of order fields to include in the response.

since_id.title: Since Id
since_id.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.

page_info.title: Page Info
page_info.description: A cursor for use in pagination. When present, only limit (and fields where supported) should accompany this parameter.

created_at_max.title: Created At Max
created_at_max.description: Show orders created at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp.

created_at_min.title: Created At Min
created_at_min.description: Show orders created at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp.

updated_at_max.title: Updated At Max
updated_at_max.description: Show orders last updated at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp.

updated_at_min.title: Updated At Min
updated_at_min.description: Show orders last updated at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp.

processed_at_max.title: Processed At Max
processed_at_max.description: Show orders imported/processed at or before this ISO 8601 timestamp.

processed_at_min.title: Processed At Min
processed_at_min.description: Show orders imported/processed at or after this ISO 8601 timestamp.

attribution_app_id.title: Attribution App Id
attribution_app_id.description: Filter to orders attributed to a given app ID; use 'current' to show orders for the calling app.

inputSchema.description:
Parameters to list Shopify orders with creation/update/processed date filters and pagination.

Note: Some fields on the Order resource are considered Protected Customer Data (PCD). If the
app/shop connection is not approved for PCD, Shopify may redact those fields or block access.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT
tools.description: Retrieves details for an existing Shopify product using its unique product ID.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product to be retrieved.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_IMAGE
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific product image, identified by its ID and its associated product ID, from a Shopify store.

image_id.title: Image Id
image_id.description: The unique numerical identifier of the image associated with the product.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique numerical identifier of the Shopify product.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_IMAGES
tools.description: Retrieves all images for a Shopify product, specified by its `product_id` which must correspond to an existing product.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Available fields include: id, product_id, position, created_at, updated_at, alt, width, height, src.

since_id.title: Since Id
since_id.description: Restricts the results to product images created after the specified image ID. Useful for pagination.

product_id.title: Product Id

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
tools.description: Retrieves a specific metafield for a Shopify product using the product ID and metafield ID.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product.

metafield_id.title: Metafield Id
metafield_id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield to retrieve.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_METAFIELDS
tools.description: Retrieves all metafields for a specific Shopify product. Metafields can be filtered by namespace and/or key.

key.title: Key
key.description: Filter metafields by key. If omitted, returns all metafields (or all within namespace if specified).

namespace.title: Namespace

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product to retrieve metafields for.

tools.description: Retrieves a list of products from a Shopify store.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: A comma-separated string of product IDs to retrieve. If this field is not provided (i.e., defaults to `None`), all products will be fetched.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS_COUNT
tools.description: Retrieves the total, unfiltered count of all products in a Shopify store.

inputSchema.title: GetProductsCountRequest
inputSchema.description: Request to retrieve the total product count; no parameters are accepted.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS_IN_COLLECTION
tools.description: Retrieves all products within a specified Shopify collection, requiring a valid `collection_id`.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of products to retrieve.

collection_id.title: Collection Id

fields.title: Fields

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GET_SHOP_DETAILS
tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive administrative information about the authenticated Shopify store, as defined by the Shopify API.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_GRAPH_QL_QUERY
tools.description: Executes a GraphQL query against the Shopify Admin API. This allows for flexible data retrieval and mutations including metafields operations.

query.title: Query
query.description: The GraphQL query string to execute against the Shopify Admin API.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Variables to be used in the GraphQL query as a dictionary.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_UPDATE_ORDER
tools.description: Updates the phone number for an existing Shopify order, identified by its ID; pass `phone=None` to remove the current phone number.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify order whose phone number is to be updated.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: The new phone number for the order. E.164 format (e.g., '+15551234567') is recommended for international numbers. An empty string `''` may also be used to clear it, depending on Shopify API behavior.

tools.name: SHOPIFY_UPDATE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
tools.description: Updates an existing metafield for a specific Shopify product.

type.title: Type
type.description: The new value type of the metafield. If not provided, the existing type will be kept.

value.title: Value
value.description: The new value for the metafield. If not provided, the existing value will be kept.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the Shopify product.

description.title: Description
description.description: A new description of the information that the metafield contains. If not provided, the existing description will be kept.

metafield_id.title: Metafield Id
metafield_id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield to update.
